As one of the important applications of the medical application ecosystem under Military Hospital 7A. Contributing to the digitization of processes in the hospital, the application provides an intuitive and convenient solution for doctors and medical staff in managing, creating, and editing reports, documents, or patients. With convenience and high security, the application will reduce the user's time and effort, contributing to increasing work efficiency in a pressurized environment such as a hospital. ğ—•ğ—¨ğ——ğ——ğ—¬ ğ—”ğ—£ğ—£ğ—Ÿğ—œğ—–ğ—”ğ—§ğ—œğ—¢ğ—¡ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§ Buddy is a new cannabis ordering app in Canada scheduled to launch in Alberta in mid-March 2019. The app looks to streamline the process of ordering cannabis from a dispensary in Alberta, but it will roll out to the rest of the county afterward. At its base is a list of government-licensed dispensaries you can use to shop from. You can use the app to browse items from a dispensary, pick out what you want and then go into the store to pay for it and pick it up. This makes it sort of like the popular takeout food ordering app Ritual, but for cannabis instead. The main difference is you can pay for your food via the Ritual app, while Buddy requires you to pay for your cannabis in person to prove youâ€™re of legal buying age Platform: Desktop Web Technology: Angular, NodeJS See more projects at: https://qkit.vn/en/portfolio

ğ—›ğ—˜ğ—”ğ—Ÿğ—§ğ—› ğ—¥ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—¢ğ—¥ğ—— ğ—”ğ—£ğ—£ğ—Ÿğ—œğ—–ğ—”ğ—§ğ—œğ—¢ğ—¡ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§ ğ—¨ğ—¡ğ——ğ—˜ğ—¥ ğ— ğ—œğ—Ÿğ—œğ—§ğ—”ğ—¥ğ—¬ ğ—›ğ—¢ğ—¦ğ—£ğ—œğ—§ğ—”ğ—Ÿ ğŸ³ğ—” One of the important customers of QKIT Software, Military Medical Hospital 7A is a central hospital, a general hospital at the last line, collecting medical examination and treatment services, in addition to the armed forces, there are also policy areas and families of martyrs, war invalids' families, and people with meritorious services to the revolution, with a specified number of 400 beds, as a basis for scientific research, medical assessment, line direction, and practice for military medical schools team, as a reserve force for the Military Region, ready for offline emergencies and any other unexpected tasks. QKIT Software has been responsible for producing important application software in the construction of modern medical facilities and is still accompanying the projects of Military Hospital 7A. Description: A medical application that integrates technology into health management, a tool to bring patients closer to doctors. Developed on a mobile platform to bring convenience to users Technology: Angular, ReactJS, Socket.io, Flutter, Python, NodeJS, WebKit, BootstrapCSS Platform: Android, IOS See more projects at: https://qkit.vn/en/portfolio

Track your order status real time and redeem your rewards through the points mechanism. Manage user information. ğ—¦ğ—”ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¨ğ—Ÿğ—œ . ğ—–ğ—›ğ—œğ—Ÿğ——ğ—¥ğ—˜ğ—¡'ğ—¦ ğ—¦ğ—§ğ—¢ğ—¥ğ—¬ğ—§ğ—˜ğ—Ÿğ—Ÿğ—œğ—¡ğ—š ğ—”ğ—£ğ—£ğ—Ÿğ—œğ—–ğ—”ğ—§ğ—œğ—¢ğ—¡ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§ Children around the world love to hear stories. They want to know more about their favorite characters and often imitate them. If the story comes with a meaningful message, good qualities such as courage, honesty, and intelligence can be engraved in children's heads early on. However, with today's pressures of life, very few parents take the time to do this.  Understanding that, as soon as we received an invitation to collaborate from Sapruli, we - QKIT Software quickly agreed and immediately started researching and developing Sapruli applications. Description: An application developed for children in Israel. This one provides an opportunity for family members to bond with each other through recording and telling children's stories used by grandparents and parents. Technology: Angular, NodeJS, PHP, Java Android, IOS Swift, Socket.io, WebKit, Python, BootstrapCSS Platform: Web, Mobile App

The Skilpe online learning platform application project is to provide users with a platform that provides online courses. Online learning application, allowing users to record lectures and create online courses. The platform also allows users to live stream lectures to learners as well as other online functions. Integrate online payment mechanisms into the application.
